document_data.title: Too Much of Me Is Magic
document_data.Synopsis: During one summer evening, a group of heroes of the Living City was asked to embark on a political mission by the [[solar]] [[Aethylnmur]] of the [[Arrus]] demiplane. The group was tasked with escorting a new ambassador to the demiplane of [[Chertt]]; however, there was one catch, no powerful magical creatures could pass through the planar ''[[gate]]'' and no hero of the living City could pass with more than ten magic items without suffering ''[[harm]]''. The passage back was only possible for the heroes carrying up to ten magic items. The group traversed the planes and escorted ambassador [[Diaphany]] to the [[Regent of Stone]] – the plane's ruler, and along the way, got involved with the so-called Big Boss – the corrupted ancient [[earth elemental]] named [[Bohuss]], who sought to end the peace treaty between Chertt and Arrus.
